message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my original asking price.  How about $13,000? I'm confident this is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
